Alesso & Other Artists Grant Spotify Covers For Mental Health Awareness

The Tim Bergling Foundation alongside Save The Children Sweden have joined forces to aid in destigmatizing discussion around mental health. They've teamed up with artists who will replace their Spotify album covers with related animated shorts. Check it out!
